StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateARN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @ARN varchar(9), @ARNStatus char(1) = NULL, @ARNDiscrepancy varchar(2) = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @ARNStatusID int DECLARE @ARNDiscrepancyID int
--- GET THE ARN STATUS ID SELECT @ARNStatusID = ARN_STATUS_ID FROM ARN_STATUS WHERE ARN_STATUS_CODE = @ARNStatus
--- GET THE ARN DISCREPANCY ID SELECT @ARNDiscrepancyID = ARN_DISCREPANCY_ID FROM ARN_DISCREPANCY WHERE ARN_DISCREPANCY_CODE = @ARNDiscrepancy
--- UPDATE THE RECORD IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ALIEN_REGISTRATION WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID) BEGIN UPDATE ALIEN_REGISTRATION SET ARN = @ARN, ARN_STATUS = @ARNStatusID, ARN_DISCREPANCY = @ARNDiscrepancyID, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT THE Alien Registra.on Data INSERT INTO ALIEN_REGISTRATION (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, ARN, ARN_STATUS, ARN_DISCREPANCY , USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@MarineCandidateID, @ARN, @ARNStatusID, @ARNDiscrepancyID, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
